subject: Attention Worthy Beneficiary
body:
Attention Worthy Beneficiary  
I shall be coming with your Inheritance and Contract /Scam Victim Compensation /ATM card /Abandoned Consignment sum amount $5.1 Million into your country for funds delivery to your doorstep Secondly Your Name has  appeared in your payment schedule first list of  the year 2024  beneficiaries that will receive their funds in this first quarter payment  in according to your the  diplomatic delivery  regulation 2024.
All I need from you is your total co-operation .If any further question do not hesitate to ask immediately and kindly send your cell phone and secure email address and active resident mailing and delivery address.
Contact me on whatsapp message or calling +1-507-476-1715
Ambassador Diplomat
Mrs  Mary Beth Leonard

subject: Re:   Attention Worthy Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Beth Leonard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your attention and the information you have shared regarding the ATM card and the funds delivery. It's interesting to hear that my name has appeared in the payment schedule for this quarter.

Before I provide any personal information, I would like to know more about the process and how everything works. Could you please explain in detail how this delivery will take place? What are the steps involved, and what should I expect?

Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by "diplomatic delivery regulation"? I want to make sure that everything is legal and legitimate.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Polly

subject: Worthy Beneficiary Polly
Re: Worthy Beneficiary Polly
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Polly

subject: Re: Attention Worthy Beneficiary
body:
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your affirmation and to inform you of
the latest development ?

It is a crime to bring in money (over US$10,000) into the United States of
America without proper documentations and clearance because it shows that
the money is either being smuggled into the country or the source of the
funds is questionable.


It is very important that all the relevant documentations needed to
authenticate the source of the funds are provided to prove that the funds
were earned legitimately in accordance with the PATRIOTACT so that the
FBI,IRS and Homeland Security will not come knocking at your door. In lieu
of the above, it is therefore mandatory that you provide the Origin of
Funds Certificate (O.O.F) to prove that the funds have no links with any
form of illegality.


Being the beneficiary of the package, the Origin of Funds Certificate
(O.O.F) is the only way of confirming the source of the funds and it is
your responsibility to provide the Certificate before the Diplomat will be
allowed to complete the delivery To You today or Tomorrow.


Upon the receipt of the payment information, the Certificate will be made
out in your name by the United nation diplomatic  Authority, scanned and
send immediately via email to us so that the Diplomat will be allowed to
complete the delivery of your package to you tomorrow.

Failure to pay for this documentation is a confirmation that you wanted to
smuggle the funds into the country which is a federal offense and a gross
violation of the Patriot Act.


It is therefore in your best interest that you pay for the Certificate as
instructed immediately as the consequences of refusing is very severe.

subject: Re: Attention Worthy Beneficiary
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. It's important to follow the proper procedures when it comes to bringing money into the United States. Can you please provide me with more details about the Origin of Funds? I want to make sure everything is in order and there are no issues with the delivery.

Also, could you clarify what payment needs to be made and how it should be done? I want to ensure that I am following all necessary steps correctly. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Polly

subject: what help Polly
Re: what help Polly
body:
Hello there! How can I assist you today?

Best wishes,
Polly

subject: no issues with the delivery.
body:
No issues with the delivery. i will bring all paper documents clearance at
your doorstep to sign before handover to your doorstep.

subject: Re: no issues with the delivery.
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your offer to bring the paper documents for clearance and signing before the delivery. That sounds convenient. Could you please provide me with more details about what exactly needs to be signed and cleared? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Best wishes,
Polly
